name: aspnet.vim
description:
Provide syntax highlighting for C# code withing <script runat="server"> ... </script> blocks as well as @ directives in *.(aspx|ascx|asmx) files.

This is a work in progress.  It's not perfect by any means, but it's quite usable.
install_details: Note that this really requires vim 6.1, or at least a C# syntax file called "cs.vim" in the $VIMRUNTIME/syntax/ directory.
